item.title: How to get the JSON field types in MySQL
item.description: To get the type of a JSON item in MySQL you need to use the JSON_TYPE function.

item.title: How to extract an item from an array in a JSON object in MySQL
item.description: To extract an item from an array in MySQL you need to use the -> operator and the [item_number] JSON Path Syntax.

item.title: How to extract a field from a JSON object in MySQL
item.description:
MySQL® offers three ways to extract fields from a JSON object:

  • the -> operator to extract the field as JSON
  • the ->> operator to extract the field as text
  • the JSON_EXTRACT function

Both operators use the JSON Path Syntax

item.title: How to extract a field from a JSON object in PostgreSQL®?
item.description: PostgreSQL® offers two types of data types to handle JSON data, JSON and JSONB, and provides several different ways to extract fields from a JSON document:
